title: The One That Got Away - PT 3: Is He Willing To Reunite After 10 Years?
description:
Eva told the Bert show that she and Jason dated 10 years ago. Jason has kids and at that time they were eight and nine years old. She had just graduated from grad school and after working hard at school and work for so many years, she wanted to have fun and wasn’t in that position. So she broke up with him.
Shortly after, she regretted it realizing she made a mistake. She tried to get back with him, but he opted not to give her another chance for fear of the effect it’ll have on the kids if she decided to bail out again.
10 years pass by and in that time, Eva had gotten married, had a kid, and is now divorced. She thinks about Jason all the time and wonders what might have been. She asked The Bert Show to help her contact him and confirm that he is single and see if he would be interested in talking to her again.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
